comments:
My console is in a state where doing anything to the text (typing, deleting) results in the following string index exception.

I can reproduce this state, by running my test class that is printing a number of lines to std out, then takes data from std in.  If I change the "Input Method" using the context menu to something other than default, the errors start to show.  Changing back to default does not solve the problem.

eclipse.buildId=I20071211-0010
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.4.2 IBM build cxia32142-20070708 (SR9) (JIT enabled: jitc)
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=gtk, NL=en_CA
Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws gtk -arch x86
